body.p: Louisville, Kentucky attorney. Zirke, Prussia native. Son of Sigmund Z. Dembitz and Fanny Wehle Dembitz. Graduated from the gymnasium at Golgau in Poland in 1848. Immigrated to Cincinnati, Ohio in 1849. Studied law under Walker and Kilber from 1849 to 1851. Studied law under Dunn and Hendricks in Madison, Indiana from 1851 to 1852. Married Minna Wehle Dembitz in 1852. Father of Henry C. Dembitz and Stell Dembitz. Admitted to the bar in 1852. Edited Der Beobachter am Ohio in Louisville from 1852 to 1853. Began legal practice in Louisville, Kentucky in 1853. Partnered with Martin Bijur from 1856 to 1864. Delegate to the Republic Party National Convention in 1860.
